channel.title: Upcoming OECD Publication Embargoes and Launches
channel.description: A list of dates and publications

item.title: Market Report Series: Coal 2017 (en)
item.description: Market Report Series: Coal 2017 (en) by International Energy Agency has an embargo on Monday, 18 December 2017, 9:00 Paris time (GMT+01:00).

item.description: Model Tax Convention on Income and on Capital: Condensed Version 2017 (en) by Centre for Tax Policy and Administration has an embargo on Monday, 18 December 2017, 14:00 Paris time (GMT+01:00).

item.title: Is too much testing bad for student performance and well-being? (en)
item.description: Is too much testing bad for student performance and well-being? (en) by Directorate for Education and Skills has an embargo on Tuesday, 19 December 2017, 7:00 Paris time (GMT+01:00).

item.title: OECD Economic Surveys: Norway 2018 (en)
item.description: OECD Economic Surveys: Norway 2018 (en) by Economics Department has an embargo on Tuesday, 19 December 2017, 9:30 Paris time (GMT+01:00).
